description: As long as my friends are smiling, I can keep smiling! So c'mon, let's see a nice big smile on your face!
Friends help friends out! You can always come to me if you're in trouble—I'll come up with something!
Gotta stay full of energy! But when you're tired, it's best to get some rest. Me? I'm not sleepy yet!
Hey, wanna hear a secret? When I'm with you, life seems twice as fun! Eheheh... Thanks a bunch!
It's weird... Sometimes I get this fuzzy feeling in my chest. I haven't caught a cold or something, have I?!
I wanna get stronger! That way I can make sure we all stay smiling forever!
I don't mind getting a little beaten up! As long as I know you've got my back, I can always keep fighting!
Just having you nearby fills me with a million times my usual energy! ...OK, maybe not quite that much.
I can hear your voice cheering me on... Even when we're apart, I can always tell you're there for me!
No matter who I'm up against, I feel like I can't lose! Not now that I have someone to support me!
U-um... You want to hang out with me? Are you sure? Well... thanks!
If you're heading to battle, I'll handle healing and support! As for attacking, um... I might need some help.
P-please, don't stare at me like that... It's embarrassing... Ahhhh...
Are you feeling hungry? Let me know when you are! I can always whip up a little snack!
Do you need help with anything? If you're heading off somewhere, I'd love to keep you company...
Let me know if there's anything you need me for! I can heal up little cuts and scratches in no time!
If it's for your sake, Mr. Knight, I... I feel like I can go the extra mile!
Healing light, come forth! H-huh? Just seeing my face makes you feel better? Stop... You're making me blush...
Hmm, what kind of magic should I study next? L-love magic, maybe? N-no, I'm sure there's no such thing!
I've been learning protective magic! Spells to protect from fire, cold, heat... And, um, fish bones. They can really hurt your throat...
I'll put in as much effort as it takes to achieve my goals. I think that's a good attitude to have—you should try it too.
Could you help me come up with a new training plan? I'm trying to find a good location...
The desire to become stronger is what matters. As long as you don't lose sight of it, you'll become stronger too.
I'm not sure why, but when I cross swords with you, it feels almost like dancing.
Do you want to go fishing with me? I enjoy fishing alone as well, but I'd like to share it with you...
Ready your weapon! If you ever plan to land a clean blow on me, there's no time to waste!
That unrelenting look in your eyes... You really are quite something. I knew I was right about you.
You can become so much stronger—I know you haven't reached your limit yet. So go ahead and prove it to me.
(Such an odd feeling... It's like I want to keep doing this forever. But that's not realistic, of course.)
I know I said I would do anything you asked... But nothing indecent, all right?
Oh, hey there, mister! What d'you wanna play today?
Urghhhh... I accidentally ate my own super-spicy prank candy...
Yay, my prank's all ready to go! Now if I just wait for him to show up... Gah! Did you see the whole thing?
I set up pranks... You fall for them... Yep, we're the perfect team!
Let's play together lots and lots more! It's a promise! C'mon, you gotta pinky swear!
Misogi Explorers, assemble! ...Pretty easy to assemble when it's just the two of us, huh?
I'm looking forward to toying with you lots and lots more! Ah, sorry, I meant "playing with." Honest!
C'mon, mister! Hurry up! Let's go exploring! I've been waiting for you!
Since I like you so much, I'm gonna come up with lots more pranks just for you!
When I play with you, it's almost like I've got a big brother! I love it!
If you're ever in trouble,\nyou can always call on me!\nI may only be an apprentice knight, but I'm a hero at heart!
Let's go take down some evil organizations! We're still barely halfway to being true heroes, but two halves make a whole!
My mom and dad always want me to wear cute outfits. All covered in ribbons and lace... Simple and practical is more my style!
We should go somewhere quiet together once in a while. Even heroes need to rest sometimes!
I really wanna play with you\nall day long! But if we get any closer, you'll find out my...\nN-no! I didn't say anything!

Haaahhhh!
As long as we have the
courage to stand up to evil,
justice will always prevail!
Yeeeaahhh! I'm getting fired up! Let's blaze down the path to true herodom!

If world peace is at stake,
I won't lose to any villain!
A true hero never goes back
on her word!
With the courage you give me,\nI'll transform into the world's greatest hero!
Being with you gives me a hundred... no, a million times\nmy usual courage!\nSo you gotta stick with me!
Say, would you come help me with my saxophone practice later?
*pant... pant...* That's enough sax for now... You really know how to wear a girl out...
What? You want to keep going? But I'm so worn out... I don't have much more in me...
You always push me so hard, it makes me all sweaty... My heart's pounding like crazy...
Say, if you had to choose between me and my sister, which would you... Ah, no, it's nothing.
Heheh, look what I can do! Put on a little jazzy music for the... Akari Pole-Dance Extravaganza!
You really want to see me do it, huh? Okay then... It's a little embarrassing, but... Here I go! Akari 360° Flip!
*pant... pant...* My poor body can't take any more... With you cheering me on, I might have gone a bit too far!
N-now I'm feeling dizzy... Hold me tight before I fall over! It's the least you can do after putting me in this state!
I wouldn't let just anyone see me do all this, you know? You're special, that's why I want to show you... everything.
My favoritest thing is pudding! Second up is pudding, third and fourth is pudding, and fifth is... more pudding!
Flying through the air is the best! Playing tricks is the best too! But pudding... Pudding is the bestestest!
Monsters were chasing me! I thought I was a goner! But then I remembered, I'm already a goner!
Me, I'm a ghost! So if you mess up and die, I'll still be your friend! Isn't that the bestest? No?
Today's the day! You promised we can go out and play! I'm gonna haunt you alllll day long!
Pudding pudding pudding pudding! Buy me more pudding! Else I might pass on from starvation!
No touching that pudding! That's Miyako's pudding! If you sneak a nibble, Miyako haunts you all night!
Ghosts are for scaring people! That's what we do! C'mon, look a bit more scared!
Grrr! Which do you care about more?! Miyako or pudding?! ...You love both? Wow! That makes sense!
Why's it just me that's a ghost?! You should kick some buckets and be a ghost too! Then we'll be together for ever and ever!
Ooh, perfect timing! You'll never believe this, but I just found an angle that makes me look even cuter! Take a look!
When word of my beauty spreads, tourists will come from far and wide to get a glimpse. I'd better make a guidebook!
Help, please! My beauty keeps radiating out! It's out of my control! Help me stop it! No, wait, that would be too cruel!
I hope you appreciate having someone as cute as me by your side! You're basically the luckiest guy in the world!
I stay by your side because that's where I want to be. Not just because you make me look even cuter by comparison!
Alas... All the jewels and treasures in the world pale before my beauty... What a tragic life I lead...
Ahhh, look how beautiful I am! So beautiful, it's like... like... Oh, it's no use! I'd need to create new words to express it!
Don't be embarrassed that you're not as beautiful as me. That's just as natural as the sky being blue.
Perhaps someday I'll give you a present more precious than any jewel. I mean myself, of course. Would that make you happy?
The precious joy of having me by your side... The gleaming world we'll create together... Truly, the world is brimming with hope.
The time is nigh for you too to reawaken to your past self! My greatest of allies and direst of foes... Sigurd of the Fulgor!
Have you committed my true name to memory? It is I, Annerose von Stechpalm!
Urgh...! My eye burns with the energy of the dark magicks sealed within! ...No, I don't need any eye drops!
Dearest Sigurd... Though this world is not our own, the bond we forged on the battlefield yet endures! Hahahahah!
Join with me, and let us crush the ambitions of the Syndicate! Only once our destiny is fulfilled can we reforge our lost bonds of m-matrimony...
Witness the shape of despair! This is my forbidden art... The Ultimate Magick of Infinite Annihilation!
If you have special techniques of your own, be sure to unleash them with flair! Let me demonstrate...
When the magicks gathered in my accursed eye spark forth, all enemies shall meet their doom!
By purging my defenses, I achieve the ultimate offensive mode! Annihilation Forme! W-wait, stop staring!
Dearest Sigurd... Thanks to you, I have kept sight of my true self. You have... my thanks.
There ya are, my prince! I just fixed myself some tea, want some?
You oughtta know every girl dreams of livin' in a fairyland. With a Prince Charming by her side, of course!
It's a prince's job to protect his princess, ya know. Any fairy tale could tell you that.
If you ever get yourself hurt, I've got a little spell that'll fix you right up. Pain, pain, go away! ♪
First thing I do when I wake up is to say good mornin' to the little birdies outside.
Twinkle twinkle hoy!☆ Ooh, looks like we're in a dingy ol' cave... But my magic's brightened the place up! Kinda pretty, ain't it?
You're gonna lead me by the hand? Well gee, that's real lovely of you... I'll light up the way ahead so we can find our way to safety!
As long as we're together, I'll light your way! So don't you let a little dark get you down, my prince!
When I'm with my prince, the whole world's like a fairy tale! Will ya whisk me off on an adventure?
Let's just keep on walkin'! Even if one of us trips up, we'll be fine as long as we're together—right, my prince?
We're siblings even if we aren't blood relatives, big bro. Huh? You don't follow?
60% of the time, I hit my target every time! Huh? That means my aim's bad?!
I'd love to go on a candy shop tour with you one of these days. What do you say?
I feel like I can do anything when you're with me, big bro! Let's keep going!
I feel like our bond has really gotten strong, big bro. I hope you feel the same way.
I heard it's "chili outside" today. We should go eat some before it's all gone!
I need to work on my aim. I don't wanna look lame in front of my big bro!
They say you should "learn by chewing." Can you cook up a treat to help me study?
Hee hee. At the rate I'm going, I'll hit the bull's-eye on your heart soon, big bro!
If anyone lays a finger on you, I'll snipe 'em with this bow, big bro!
If you ever need anything, come straight to me! I'll help out with all my powers!
A good sleep and I'm raring to go! Don't lollygag or I'll leave you in the dust!
*yawn* I'm a little sleepy, but I'm triple-A-okay! Wahey! ☆
*mumble* Shiori, you're so soft and comfy... Huh? Wait, that was you?
Love and peace! I'll take out monsters in one shot with my telekinesis! I'm tough!
Hey, you wanna take a nap next to me? We've got a bed of grass, all warmed up by the sun!
After I use my powers a lot, I recharge with the power of the land! My batteries are full!
Hee hee! Being with you makes me feel all warm and happy inside... And sleepy. *yawn*
*mumble* Feels nice when you're here... Good dreams tonight...
I think I must've had a good dream. You were there. Maybe I saw our future? Hee hee.
Aww, did you come to see me? Hee hee. I'm so happy!
What sort of book should I read today? What type is your favorite?
Hee hee. Think of me as something of a surrogate mother.
Aww, what a good boy. I'll always be right here by your side. ♪
I'll always be on your side, no matter what happens. So don't be afraid to let yourself be spoiled.
If you're ever having a tough time, you can always come to me. I'll be here to help.
You're doing such a great job! I'm always watching how hard you work. Good boy!
Oh no, are you hurt? Let me see that. I'll make it better. Pain, pain, go away!
I'll be your personal teacher for the day. Don't tell the kids, of course. Otherwise they might get jealous. ♪
It makes me so happy to hear that you feel at ease around me. There's always a pleasant warmth in my heart when you're around, too.
Whattup, whiz-boy? I was hoping you could help me with my math again?
How much of the times table do you know? All of it?! Forget smart, you're a brain genius!
I'm gonna be a model at an event today. You should come and see me!
Talking to you makes me feel, like, warm and relaxed. No, I mean it! Totes for reals!
Whattup, whiz-boy? Wanna eat lunch together? Lemme take you to this hot new spot I found!
My arrow of love will pierce the hearts of all my fans. Including you, of course!
I've got the best new pose for my next shoot. What do you think? Strong but cute, right?
Ooh, the ocean's never looked prettier! Maybe it's because I'm here with a special someone?
My model friends think you're my BF! How funny is that? I mean, not that I'd... Oops!
You don't have to treat me special just 'cause I'm a model. To me, your smarts are cooler!
Haitai! Always feels good to give a lively greeting!
I get things done in my own sweet time! Rushing through life never helped anyone!
Goya and soki and sata andagi! I sure do miss the food from back home!
When I'm adventuring with you, I know everything's gonna be right as rain!
I wanna take you to see my hometown someday! The glistening waves, the sparkling white sand... I know you'll love it!
Haitai! I just know today's gonna be a good one! I'm so excited, I feel like dancing!
With all the great friends I've got, every day's a blast! Sometimes it makes me wanna dance!
Let's take a trip to the beach! Nothing feels better than the water on your skin!
The water feels so great! C'mon, you should join me! I'll hold your hand so you don't fall!
Is anything better than dancing together? C'mon, you should join in too!
Don't forget, I'm still a teacher! If you need help with language, I'll tutor you! ♪
I teach language arts, but I wish romance novels and shojo manga could be subjects...
I have so many lovely memories of my demon school days. Take time to enjoy these moments!
Homework giving you trouble? I'll help! This sentence means... Hmm? I'm too close?
When we're out together, people always think we're a couple. I guess I don't really mind it, though…
I-I fell down. I need to get it together and be a better teacher, but I'm not there yet.
I'm not a token ditz character, you know. I just happen to slip up sometimes. Honestly!
I ran into a monster, but it blushed and fell over when it saw my face. I wonder why.
If I trip again, will you help me? Hee hee, I know I'm a teacher, but I keep needing you.
I wonder what my first boyfriend will be like? I hope he's like you, and helps when I fall.
Red, white, yellow... Such pretty flowers. ♪ Mr. Bug is buzzing, Mr. Butterfly fluttering! ♪
Mr. Bunny, ♪ Mr. Kitty, ♪\nMr. Doggy! ♪\nThey're all my friends. ♪
Are you going to play with me,\nMr. Nice Guy? Yay! I'm so happy! ♪
Mimi loooves Mr. Nice Guy! And the bunnies and flowers, too!
Mr. Nice Guy is the best! Here's a hug! Now you hug me back!
Mr. Mini-Gryphon is sooo fast! Whoosh! Hurry up, Mr. Nice Guy! ♪
I'm gonna make a flower crown. ♪ All for Mr. Nice Guy. ♪

Papa, Mama and my friends,
the critters and flowers,
and Mr. Nice Guy!
They're all my favorite things. ♪
This is my secret flower garden! But I'll tell you all about it, Mr. Nice Guy. After all, you're the best!
Mimi and Mr. Mini-Gryphon both love Mr. Nice Guy. ♪ I'm glad we're together! ♪
I feel a lot less nervous when I'm around you. *giggle* I give in to your kindness.
H-hey, I was wondering. How come you're always so nice to me?
I'm doing speech training so I can talk to others better. She sells seashells...
H-hey, wanna play house? I'll be the mom, and you be the dad!
Hee hee! You came to play with me again! I'm so happy!
So, umm... No, it's nothing! Never mind! Sorry to bug you...
*whine* D-do I have something on my face? Please don't stare like that!
I want to keep practicing in this forest for a while... I couldn't bear showing anyone until I improve…
*whimper* Don't stare at me... Oh, umm, but I don't want you to not look at me, either.
Umm, you see... I like to act out scenes and plays. It'd be nice if you'd watch me.
S-so, umm, I wanted to ask you if... Uhh, on second thought, never mind!
A new game goes on sale today. If you want, we could play it t-tog... I can't!
With you I can kinda sorta talk okay, but I want to be able to do it better.
It feels normal being around you now. That's not special? I sure think it is.
Want to go shopping? Okay, good practice. Let's do this. Ack! D-did you overhear me?!
I-I didn't pick this flower just to show it to you or anything!
What a pretty meadow. I-I don't think I fit this backdrop... Oh, um, never mind.
I kinda like places like this, you know. I... am a girl, after all.
Since we have all these flowers here... He loves me, he loves me not... Eep!
Does bringing me here mean you're sort of treating me like a proper girl, maybe?
Pukichi's my dearest friend, so try to get along with him!
I came to the Orphanage first, so I'm like the big sister, and you're like my little brother!
You, me, and Pukichi! Together, we're unstoppable!
Pukichi was pretty annoyed at you 'cause you don't play with us enough.
Do you like Pukichi? I love him! Every bit as much as I love you!
W-wake up! Pukichi will clobber you if you don't watch where you're going!
Hi-yah! Back off, ya mangy monsters! Ack, no! Don't go near him!
Watch me, watch me! I've been practicing my Pukichi Fullswings! Check this out!
Hey! Are you hurt? Any wounds? It's okay now—Pukichi and I are here to help!
Stay away, you dumb monsters! Let's do this, Pukichi! "You got it, Ayane!"
Sorry I always mess up. I'll atone by committing seppuku! Huh? That'd be worse?
I'll attend to your every— Waahh! I... I bumped my head...
Cooking, laundry, cleaning... I've got so much to do, it's making my head spin!
I live to serve! Whatever you need, just say the word!
I'm going to try really hard to clean properly. If I do a good job, will you compliment me?
Poor little golem. Someone just abandoned it on the side of the road.
You're going to help me polish the golem? Hee hee. Thank you!
Are you injured? I'm very good at healing magic! Other magic... Not so much.
Oh no, I did it again! I promised myself I'd try harder not to mess up in front of you!
Welcome home, master. J-just joking around! Hee hee hee!
Wish I could just laze about forever, honestly. Don't you agree?
Hey, c'mere. Kick back and play a game with me or something. You gotta make time to relax!
I'm starving. Got anything to eat? Preferably a sweet bun?
Usually I just lie around by myself. It's a lot more fun having you to play with.
Normally I'm not good with people entering my personal space. But you, I don't mind.
Have I died and gone to heaven? Do I really get to roll around in my beloved acorns?
Ahh, it's like this place was built just for me. I might not ever wanna leave.
Nothing beats a comfy bed, but being enveloped in nature's a close second.
Hey, over here! Come experience paradise with me. You can sit right here!
This place really is amazing. Way worth coming outside for. Thanks for bringing me here!
I've poured my heart into this love potion. I'm thinking of you the whole time, my love.
My main job is a florist. My poison weed bouquets are quite popular right now.
Flowers are important. They support life and make fine ingredients. Pretty? If you say so.
When I think about how this potion'll let me do whatever I want to you... I love my work.
What a nice flower. He loves me, he adores me, he loves me, he adores me...
What sort of girl do you want? Should I be cheery? Chill? You do only want me, right?
Some monsters can read your mind and show a vision of your desires. What would my love see?
Look at me. Only at me. Even if another me appears, never take your eyes off me.
If an impostor of you showed up, I'd hang him up like a decoration. I need the real you.
What would you like me to be, my love? I can be your ideal woman. I love you to death.
I found a store that sells crayons, coloring books, and blocks for cheap! Help me shop!
When cooking, you need to use every last bit of your ingredients. Waste not, want not!
Money is important, but I just want to see a smile on everyone's face. Including yours!
You and I should go somewhere fun sometime. Just as long as it's free, of course.
I want to have a tea party. You'll be invited, of course. It'll be lots of fun!
The line for limited items starts here... Oh, you came too! Welcome to our bazaar!
I'll call out to the customers. Can you twirl this sign to draw them in?
I can't believe we got so many customers! You may as well go do your shopping, too!
Thanks for helping me manage the lines. Work is so much more fun with you around!
The bazaar was a hit! Let's celebrate with a feast. You'll be the ultimate refreshment!
I'm not satisfied with where I am. I need to improve my skills so I can be a top idol!
This flashy swimsuit's for the photo shoot! My personal one's much cuter. Wanna see it?
It's a long road to becoming a top idol. I'm gonna work harder on my dancing and singing!
I want to be a better singer and dancer so you can see me shine brighter than ever!
Are your idol studies going well? Don't focus too hard on the ones who aren't me!
I wonder how the world will look when I'm a top idol? I hope you'll still be at my side.
You've gotta be ready to step outside your comfort zone to be on-stage! I can do this!
I'm working hard to reach the heights of a top idol! I hope you'll cheer for me!
There were a couple of times I thought I might quit being an idol if you wanted me to.
You can really hear the longing of the girl in my song? You're so oblivious!
Dekedekeden! I'm always ready to prove my loyalty to my shogun! You just wait and see!
Oh noes! An Evil Magistrate is threatening the shogunate! This calls for ninja smiting!
Ooh! Shogun! What are you— Wait! I know! You're ninja training, aren't you?! Let me join in!
For my shogun, I would gladly brave the elements! My life and honor belong to my shogun!
Yamato nadeshiko is a noble Eastern ideal of womanhood! When I become one, even you won't resist my charms!
One day, I'll help my shogun unite the lands! That's my important dream!
My superior Eastern blade can cut down anything! You can count on your loyal retainer!
Worry not, Shogun! I kept your sandals warm inside my kimono! Let's go do ninja things!
Shogun, take my hand! Eheheh... This represents the bond of honor that binds us together!
Shogun! Do you want dinner? Or a bath? Or maybe... me? ...Wow, that was embarrassing...
Your fortune today is the worst possible. I'm rarely wrong, but, err, don't worry about it.
Who's that behind you? Hmm? You can't see them?
There are many methods of fortune-telling. I prefer using my father as my crystal ball.
Father seems to have the wrong impression of you. I know you're a very kind soul.
I predict you'll have trouble with women today. You should just try to stay with me...
You think my dancing is beautiful? That's very kind. It makes all the practice worth it.
This is the Dance of Souls. I'm still trying to learn it, so don't stare. It makes me shy.
Father says my dancing is so sublime, he may pass on. Which is nice, but I don't want that.
Your praise makes me dance better. Positive thoughts help wayward souls rest in peace.
You're the first living soul I've danced for. I'm still a bit shy, but I want you to see.
Come to me with any troubles you have! I'll find a way to take care of them!
Good day. I request your guidance and support to help me become a true merchant!
I have a poor sense of direction, but it's not that bad. Which way is my house, again?
I'll wait as long as it takes for you to become my knight. Then we'll travel the world!
There are some things money can't buy. Like your heart, for example!
I live by the teachings of House Wisteria! A true merchant is also a full-fledged fighter!
These foes pose no threat. I'll take them out, and we'll celebrate with a feast!
I shall strike down any and all who dare to hinder my business!
Have you noticed how much stronger it makes me to have you at my side?
With you at my side, I feel no hesitation. I'll proceed no matter what lies ahead!
Comedy's tougher 'n herding cats! Let's figure out the secrets together, cuz!
I'd rather get my clock cleaned by a monster than bomb when tellin' a joke!
This milk's sweet as pie, pal. Moo-ve on over and try some!
Hey, pal! What say we try 'n become stand-up comedy champs? We could do it!
Let's write some jokes, cuz! 'Cuz why? 'Cuz why not, cousin? Get it? Bahaha!
Gather 'round, folks! Farm-to-table Elizabeth Park milk, yogurt, and cheese for sale!
C'mon and have a taste, y'all! Everything's fresh! I tell jokes, but I never tell lies!
All the folks from in town are supportin' me! I gotta knock 'em dead with my jokes!
Ain't my jokes a lark? Yer my first fan 'n all, so we must think alike!
C-can I call ya my pardner, pal? Or if not, my hubby? Whoops! Other way around!
If you ever need advice, come talk to me, okay? I've always got your back!
Hey, are you busy? Wanna go grab a drink with me? Soft drinks for you, of course.
I brought my work home, but there's just no end in sight! *groan* Can you help me?
Hic! You're real warm, y'know that? I drank a bit too much, so c'mere and warm me up.
Are you eating right? I'd be happy to cook for you if you want.
Mmm, these berries smell awesome! They'd go great in a mixer. No! I'm at work!
Stop now, Yukari! You're gonna end up embarrassing yourself again!
I feel all warm and fuzzy... Maybe it's just because of you?
When you're old enough to drink, we should go out and celebrate with a few cold ones!
What'cha say we go out on a date? Or would you rather not be seen with me?
It's study time right now, so please don't talk to m—\n...Oh, don't look so crestfallen!\nFine, I'll play with you!
I'll never grow up if I don't eat my carrots and peppers? Urgh...\nI really do want to grow, but...
Listen to this! I grew!\nI'm a whole millimeter taller!
I may be a child now, but I'll be grown up in no time. When I am, maybe we can, umm...
Heheh. You've been working pretty hard. Just this once, I'll give you a pat on the head.
You'll protect me?\nI don't need your assistance!\nB-but thank you all the same.
M-my legs have gone all wobbly... This is embarrassing...
Urgh... Why does he always have to see me at the most embarrassing moments?
I... I'm not scared of monsters!\nB-but it was nice of you...\nto protect me...
It's not safe outside the city.\nThere are monsters out there.\nSo I'll just have to protect you.

Oh? What are you doing here?
If you make any sudden moves,
I might have to arrest you.
...Haha, I'm just kidding!
I'd like to do some training with you. Don't worry, don't worry!\nOf course I'll go easy on you!\nHaha... Unless I change my mind.
It's about time for my daily patrol. Want to join me?\nDon't worry, I'll keep you safe if we run into any kind of trouble.
Hmmm... I always thought I was pretty quick-witted, but with you, I stumble over my words. What's wrong with me lately?
Whenever I try to tease you, you seem to turn the tables on me. Honestly, what am I going to do with you? It really throws me off.
Watch the enemy's movements, and when you see an opening, deliver a decisive strike! That's the essence of swordfighting.
I'm always tired out after a battle, and hungry, too. Do you want to join me for a meal?
As you eliminate unnecessary motions, your strikes become more and more fluid. A simple concept, but tricky to execute.
I want to get even stronger\nso I can protect you from harm. That's my main motivation lately.\nIt makes me glad to be a knight.
Just being around you fills me with strength. There's something about you that has a positive effect on me.
I know a great book you should read. It'd be fun if we could talk about it together.
*cough, hack* Umm, could you please pat my back a little?
When I get better, I want to go somewhere far, far away with you. Maybe. Hee hee!
I don't have much stamina, so I tire easily. I'm not a burden, am I?
I wish I could take care of myself more. *cough* S-sorry, can you get me some water?
This little one's name is Nyatt. He's very obedient.
Nyatt may be huge, but he's a big softie at heart. Aww, Nyatt, you're so sweet!
I raised Nyatt from a cub. He's all grown up now and he's still my best friend.
Are you tired, too? Maybe you'd like to take a rest with me?
Nyatt's fur is so soft! I love being with him... And the same goes for you.
The BB Brigade is here to help everyone make friends! Hee hee! I hope you like us!
Everyone has to take that first step before they make a friend. I wish I could, too...
Watering the plants, feeding the animals... There's lots of fun to be had, even on my own!
I might be just fine if you were my only friend... Oh, umm, err, n-never mind!
Does he think I'm... Eek! This is flower fortune-telling. What did I ask? C-can't say!
I may not be strong, but I want to be useful to everyone. Maybe then I'll make more friends?
I just know there's some way I can help, even on my own. I'll give it all I've got!
The BB Brigade's taught me so much. Like working hard to protect the things I care for!
I get so eager to see you for our BB Brigade activities, I'm always excited for tomorrow!
Tee-hee. Don't worry. No matter how many friends I make, you'll always be number one!
My summoning powers are for protecting people. I want to start making better use of them.
Umm... if you're not too busy, would you like to help me again with my idol practice?
La la la! ♪ Aah! H-how long have you been there?! Were you listening?
I don't quite know why, but when it's just the two of us, I don't get nervous when I sing.
Music has so much power. I learned that from my friends... and from you.
Come here, just a bit closer. When you're nearby, the melodies come naturally to me.
Are you awake? There's a festival in the next town over. Want to go see it with me?
I have so much I want to say, I can't write it all. I never knew I needed to sing so much.
One of these days, I'll be able to sing about my feelings for you without any shyness.
I could sit here with you listening to the waves forever... D-did I say that out loud?
Time to head out on patrol. You can come along, if you want.
You're eating properly, right? If you're not, I can cook for you, got it?
You're the only person who treats me like a normal girl. I-I didn't know it'd be this nice.
If my friend owes you a debt, then so do I. Let's make this a great partnership!
You're brave, and you've got guts. I like hanging with you. How do you feel about me?
Don't leave my side! I'll chop up anything that comes near us!
I can't let loose against all these wimps! I want an enemy who'll give me a fight!
Together, there's no enemy we can't beat! I'll watch your back, so you watch mine!
Aww yeah! Enemies are KO'ed, so let's blow off some steam and eat! What'cha craving?
I'm brimming with power! Stay close. I'll protect you no matter what comes!
Have we met before?\nI have the oddest sense of nostalgia when I look at you.
Urgh... I have the most intense craving for tomato juice.\nGo and fetch me some!
Moving around during the day is quite the struggle. Thus, you must stay here and speak with me until night falls.
Do you not find me at all terrifying? Wha—? "Cute"?!\nDon't overstep your bounds, minion!
You are my most special minion. Henceforth you should refer to yourself as "Ruler of the Day."
Is my true form not breathtaking? Hmm? You prefer my usual form? How boring of you!
What is my goal, you ask? Nothing other than world domination! As a woman,\nI won't accept anything less! ♪
The vampire of legends herself stands before you! I could snatch away your life with ease, but I do prefer to have you as my minion.
Once the world is mine,\nI shall grant half of it to you.\nY-you understand what that implies, yes?
Lately I have been seeing you so often, it is disturbing my sleep patterns. Staying up all day is not good for my skin, but...
Gueheheh... Huh? Oh, uh, nothing! I was just imagining things while looking at you... *pant*
Mr. Sadist cornered Kuka and then forced her to... Gueheheh... Eek! H-how long have you been there?
I read an amazing book the other day... Huh? What was it about? U-uh... It's probably best not to ask.
Mr. Sadist even appears in my dreams now... Asleep or awake, I respond to the crack of his whip.
Alone with Mr. Sadist... O-oh my! Just what sort of humiliations await me this time?
Mr. Sadist gazed upon the sullied Kuka with cold eyes... Heehee, eeheehee! I'm getting excited again!
I'm looking forward to all the horrible things you'll do to me after I've behaved in such a shameful manner!
You were about to scold me for enjoying the way the monsters rough me up, right? You're such a pro, Mr. Sadist!
I'm not fit to be a bride. So please keep me firmly under your boot, Mr. Sadist! Beat your lessons into me!
My body can't live without you, Mr. Sadist... Y-you're willing to accept the responsibility, right?
I buy taiyaki for all the stray cats, you knyow! It makes them purr with satisfaction!
Hurry up and get ready so we can leave! Time is rupies!
Meowsy on over! I've got a tasty tidbit fur you. Wannya get in on the secret?
I'm a little fickle, so you'd better catch me good and tight or I'll slip away!
If you get a scratch, I wouldn't mind licking it better. Myahaha!
I always help those in nyeed! Tonight I'll be prowling around town with my fellow felines!
You should come to the guild to play! Myahaha, now we'll get a nyew member... O-oops!
When the fur hits the fan you can count on me. Shall we kick butt today? Let's go!
Eheheh. If I can be with you, maybe I wouldn't myind being a housecat. ...Kidding, kidding!
I saved the purr-fect snack to share with you—taiyaki! Let's split it.
There are reasons why I can't remove my armor, but I'm still a woman under this mask.
My armor gets extremely hot in the sun. But somehow, I stay fairly cool inside.
I love all forms of exercise, but I'm a poor swimmer. My armor's just too heavy...
I know my mask hides my face,\nso I do my best to express my thoughts and emotions in other ways.
Even if you can't see my face, I'm always watching yours.
I wield my sword to make this world a place where swords are no longer necessary.
To protect the smiles of the children, I will stand against even the strongest foe.
Even if this land is engulfed in the flames of hell itself, I will aid those in need.
When I feel your gaze on my back in battle, it puts me at ease.
As a leader, I must protect all peoples, but I find myself prioritizing you...
Hoarding items, or saving up rupies? I've got plans for both, so ask if you're not sure.
I've come up with the perfect plan. If we're going outside the town, let's get moving.
The key to efficiency is being observant. Are you training your senses?
I've got too many jobs and not enough hands. Mind helping me? I know you can do it.
Want me to manage your daily schedule? I'll be there 24 hours a day. For a fee, of course.
Would you like me to manage your finances? Huh? No, I wouldn't steal your money! How could you think that?!
There's a thief in town? That's an insult to all hard-working people! Unforgivable!
There's a big sale going on today! Come with me, but stay on guard! Chaaarge!
So, do you have a certain type of girl you like? I-I'm just making conversation!
If anyone so much as scratches you, I'll beat 'em to a pulp! No one hurts my star pupil!
You can talk to me about absolutely any tiny little thing. Let me take care of it!
Your big sis is always here to love on you, whether it's a gentle pat or a big hug!
Sometimes I get so happy I feel like chopping you. But it's a sign of my love!
I'll handle whatever it is you need. It's a big sister's job to care for her brother!
What is it? You need me? Your big sis is here with open arms. Anywhere, anytime!
I'll punish anyone who bothers my sweet little bro!
No matter what happens, big sis will protect you! No one lays a hand on my little bro!
I got really strong to protect you, little bro. I'm your sword, shield, and armor.
If any of those slobs give you grief, I'll give them more than just a chop!
Even if the heavens and gods themselves allow you to be bullied, I won't.
Look at this magazine! Which of these outfits do you think would look better on me?
Quick question. Can you multiply three-digit numbers? Whoa. A-and division, too?!
You need education to be a grown woman? B-but not necessarily good grades, right?
Kids my age are so childish. I get bored with them. So be glad I hang out with you!
First we'll hit the cafe, then... I can see you don't know squat, so I'll just escort you!
I'm a grown woman—I can handle a few monsters! But if you're worried, you can come.
I beat up a monster and got a treasure! But my parents said kids don't need money and took it.
Beat it, monsters! Lady Misaki's coming through! And you, you have to escort me!
Lately we've had a lot of chances to go out together. I'm having a blast. How about you?
Let's crush some monsters and spend the gold on dinner! B-but it's not a date!
Are you busy? Oh, don't be afraid. I won't do anything dangerous. You can trust me, okay?
Want to do an experiment with me? Nothing beats the thrill of making a new discovery!
Science is meant to benefit everyone. My goal really is to heal people, you know.
After examining you so much, I've taken an interest in you personally. Heh, heh.
Thank you for helping with my experiments. As thanks, I made a special potion for you.
Oh my, you want me to punish you? You've come around, then. I'll happily oblige!
Tell me... what do you feel when you look at me? Fear? Hmm, that's odd...
There's always that moment where pain turns to pleasure. Shall I demonstrate?
I created this perfume specifically to snare you! Why does it only work on monsters?
Oddly, when I'm with you my heart starts racing. Want to put your ear to it and listen?
I use all this muscle to work really hard at my jobs! I just worry it's not very feminine.
Look! Isn't this armor fantastic? It's stylish and it fits me like a glove. I love it!
Come on, you're getting carried away with petting me! I just got done styling my fur!
I'll do whatever I can to look more feminine, so that I'll always be able to stay with you.
*sigh* I wish we could walk around chatting like a normal boy and girl out on a date...
Just because I look like this doesn't mean I shouldn't take care of my appearance. I want you to like how I look!
Hmm? You want to feel my fluffy wool again? Okay, I'll make an exception for you.
Many people take me for a monster, but after meeting you, I learned not to let it bug me!
Despite my looks, you treated me like a normal girl! I love how you see what's inside!
I feel like an ordinary girl out on a lovely walk with a friend. I'm so happy!
My lad, let us give our hearts and souls for the prosperity of Weissflügel!
I am not a child! I-I know I'm short, but I'm definitely still growing!
Hmm? What is it? You want to train with me? Quite the admirable spirit you have there!
A soldier always pays her debts. If there's ever something I can do for you, just name it.
B-by the way... What do you think about taking a trip to visit my home country?
How many times must I say this? I'm not a child! Quit patting my head!
The majesty of Weissflügel swordplay swoops down from the sky! Behold!
You seem sluggish, my lad. Meet me out on the plains at once! It's time to train!
I'm not a child, but I suppose I look like one to you, right? I'd like to think I don't...
I trust you with my life. Let us fight to our last breath with the pride of soldiers!
Now listen here, Mr. Knight.\nIf you try anything funny with my Rei, I'll make sure you regret it!
I'm going to keep a close eye on you to make sure you don't try anything with Rei!
Oh, just look at your clothes... Come over here a second, and I'll fix them right up for you.
So, um... about you and Rei...\nI'm guessing you do feel something special for...\nN-no, forget it! I said nothing!
Why do you keep being nice to me after I treated you so awfully? Don't tell me... you want me to tie you up again?!
I can handle any number of these monsters, as long as you're here by my side! ...Not that I mean anything weird by that!
You're getting a little close there. Back off a little, would you?\nUnless you want to become the new outlet for my daily stress!
If I have any materials left over,\nI guess I could make a little something for you, too.\nLet's see... What would you like?
Have you been... getting along well with Rei as usual?\n...What?! I was just curious!
Tell me, is there anything you need me to help you with?\nJust this once, I'll do it for free!
Let's do our best as fellow skyfarers! Don't hesitate to ask if you ever need anything!
Shall we train together? We'll get better results working together, right?
Once we have our airship, let's tour the entire continent of Astraea.
With you beside me, I have nothing to fear! ...What? I'm serious!
Hey there, first officer! I'm talking to you! Or should I stick to calling you by name?
Time to show you how my training has paid off! Here goes!
To protect those I care about, I will fight!
I train hard each day for our adventures! No one will ever beat me!
As captain, I won't let you lay a single finger on my friends! You're going to have to face me!
I feel like I can overcome any kind of obstacle with you around!
Eheheh, I'm getting pretty attached to this "Pecorine" nickname.
Are you not a fan of cooked monster? Personally, I love it.
Grrrrr... M-my stomach's growling. H-hey, don't laugh!
Let's get some food! Everyone becomes friends after sharing a meal, right?
Are you giving me food? Wow, I think I might be in love!
Are you hungry? How about you and I go get something to eat?
We mustn't waste food. Well, with me around it's not like there will ever be any leftovers...
What kind of food do I like? Let's see... "All you can eat" and "all you can drink"!
Eating alone with a boy\nmakes me all nervous!\nHow crazy is that?! ☆
What type of men do I like? Well, the type of men who don't waste food!
As your guide, it is my duty to support you at every turn.
My lord, are you hungry? Having a full stomach is the first step to everything.
You appear tired. Your well-being is my duty. If you need anything at all, please ask.
It fills me with joy to be serving someone as kind as you, my lord.
Please treat me as you would your own bride. ♪
I've communed with the spirits since I was young, preparing for your arrival. Please make good use of me.
It seems your gaze makes the spirits feel good as well. ♪
I shall be one with the natural world in serving you, my lord.
I have been looking forward to seeing to your needs since I was a child, my lord.
Please summon me if you ever require something. I shall fulfill your desire with all my body and soul.
So you say you saved me, huh? Whatever. I guess I'll say thanks, just in case.
Don't be so chummy when you talk to me! We're not friends. We're not anything!
Erase your presence and observe him... Eek! Argh, why do I always get spotted?!
It must be tough with your amnesia and all. But I'll take care of you, so be grateful. ♪
Honestly, you and I really shouldn't be getting so close. But it's fun, so who cares?
S-so you saw my secret magic practice session. Fine, then! You're helping me with my training!
Isn't my magic amazing? Heh heh. That's right, keep the compliments coming!
Perfect! I'm really getting good at this. I guess I just needed to put in the work!
Spectacular, right? Until recently I was a total beginner. Hey, act a little surprised!
I'm decent at healing magic, too. If by some chance you get hurt, I can probably save you.
Landosol's amazing. It's so huge, with so much to do! Totally the opposite of my village.
My village is a nice place. There's really nothing there, but I know you'd like it!
You kinda remind me of Losaria. Like, for example, I feel relaxed when we're together.
When we're together, my heart races and my chest gets tight. But, like, in a good way.
Being with you makes my heart flutter... But it also puts me at ease.
I'll be a forest guardian one day! Along with Losaria,  of course!
Landosol may be a big city, but the scent of the air kinda reminds me of home.
There are fairies all over my village! I really wanna show you someday.
Being with you makes me feel so funny inside. Excited, but calm. Relaxed, but nervous.
I'm having a lot more fun here than back in the forest. I'm sure it's all thanks to you!
Tedious debates are no fun at all!\nI prefer to resolve things in a much more simple way: with an all-out battle to the death! ☆
This world is full of interminable irritations. Don't you think it's better to live a wild and honest life, true to your own desires?
Strength can be a blessing and a curse. It's hard to find a thrilling struggle when barely anyone can come close to matching me.
I bet the men who failed to touch my chest would resent your unwitting success. But fear not! They met with an early demise.
I'll spare no effort to ensure your married life with me is a happy one. You see? Aren't I just the sweetest blushing bride?
Of course I'm not insane.\nHuman lives are fragile and fleeting... I'm just making the most of mine while I still can!

Let's dance a merry jig
in the pools of blood that
garnish the battlefield.
Come now, take my hand!
Geas or no geas, I'm not wooing you against my will. This is the path I chose. You touched me, and that makes you worthy!
Do you have any exciting news that will set my heart racing?\nIf not, I'll just have to spark the flames of conflict myself!
You want to see more of my childhood photos? Please don't tell me you really are only interested in younger girls...
I got myself a new swimsuit! Well? Does it suit me?
This swimsuit's surprisingly suited for physical activity! I might be able to take a dip in the ocean and fish up some stuff!
Let's play some beach sports, like beach volleyball or beach flags! Don't think I'll go easy on you, though!
You'll never be able to take your eyes off me while I'm wearing this! Haha, just kidding!
It'd be a waste not to make the most of this trip now that I've got myself a nice swimsuit. The more fun memories, the better!
Oof, you got me good! The water's so salty, too! Don't think you'll get away with this, you little scoundrel!
The calm, blue sea! A gleaming white beach! The radiant sunshine! Plus, a whole load of tasty seafood! If this isn't heaven, then I don't know what is!
The water here's just so pleasant. Honestly, this has to be the most fulfilling summer of my life!
Ehehe. ♪ Spending time with you at the beach feels so new and exciting! This is what youth is all about!
Don't worry. If my swimsuit gets swept away, I'll just hug you to keep myself nice and hidden!
Our friends at the Orphanage chose this swimsuit for me...\nDoes it look all right, I wonder?
My lord, if you would not mind,\nI would like to practice our swimming technique together.
My lord, I have heard tell\nof something known as a "sandcastle." Would you help\nme to build one of my own?

It does embarrass me a little
to show so much skin...
I would rather only wear this
in front of you, my lord.

Could you help me to apply
this sunscreen, my lord?
You are the only one I can trust
to care for my skin.
My lord... No matter the location,\nI will always stay by your side. Please do not let go of my hand.

Look, my lord!
The fish are so close, I could
reach out and touch them!
What a truly magical sight...
If we surrender ourselves to the currents, where might they carry us off to? With you by my side,\nI would not mind finding out.
I hope the two of us can always remain together, visiting the same places and admiring the same wondrous sights.
The two of us are alone in these vast ocean waters. At least for this moment, I have you all to myself.
Working's just so fun! Even more so when it's with you! ♪
What's that? You'd like to go for a swim during your break time? Feel free! In fact, let me join you!
I'm too much of a klutz to ever make a proper sand castle, so... Would you mind making one with me? Thank you! ♪
I'm glad you think my swimsuit looks good on me, but, well... It's kind of embarrassing if you stare at me that much!
Are you busy right now? If not, then... D-do you mind if I stay by your side for a bit?
Oh no, I didn't realize there were fireworks here! Please stay back, children! It's dangerous! Wahhh! That's hot!
The fireworks are pretty, yes, but there are more pressing matters here! Someone help me!
Doing this with everyone is so much fun! For my next trick, I'll dual wield these fireworks! ♪
I wonder if people see us as a couple like this? Just kidding. Ehehe. ☆
W-would you mind if I offered to serve you, too? W-wait, ignore that! Please!
You think this suits me? I don't remember asking for your opinion. But, well... Thanks.
I have so been waiting for this! I'm gonna go all out, so you better be ready!
This swim ring's super cute, isn't it? It's real comfy, too. I'll even give you a turn, if you insist.
Never a dull moment with you, if I'm being honest. ...You wanna know what that's supposed to mean? Well, uh... It's fun being with you!
I'm cool hanging out just the two of us, you know. And hey. It's not like you have a choice in the matter. ♪
H-hey. There's a hole in my swim ring, isn't there? There is! And there's monsters here, to boot! Argh! Get away, get away!
Quit eyeing my juice like that, will you? Fine, fine. You can have some. But just a sip.
Nothing better than a good drink after working up a sweat. Ahh. Simply delicious. ♪
You're looking pretty exhausted. Wanna hop on my swim ring and chill out together?
Honestly, this is one of those times I feel like I'm genuinely happy. And I think it's all because of you. Um... Th-thank— Actually, never mind!
What's up?\nDoes the sight of my swimsuit make your heart start purring?
What am I doing? Getting ready to make taiyaki, of course!\nWe've got a business to run here!
You want to lend a paw?\nMuch a-purr-eciated!\nAs thanks, I'll let you touch... Myahaha! Just kidding!
I can't stand the water,\nso let's play on the sand!\nMyah?! The waves are closing in!
You can't beat the sea as a source of tasty treats! If only it didn't have... all that nyasty water...
Yakisoba noodles, shaved ice, taiyaki... Beach cafes are a treasure trove of tasty snyacks!

Come one, come all,
to our beach cafe!
Nyow with a new sweet treat
you won't find anywhere else!
You don't want to miss out on this summer's exclusive dessert! Experience a flavor like you've nyever tasted before!
You want to try a bite?\nGo on, say "myaaaah"!
You've done nyothing but help\nme out this whole summer.\nYou're the world's best partner!
I'm lucky to have a fine student to help me. What's that? Payment? Hmmm... Isn't seeing me in this swimsuit payment enough?
Have you forgotten anything?\nAre you fully prepared?\nThen let's head out and have ourselves an adventure!
Why am I wearing a swimsuit, you ask? Because it's the most efficient attire for beach work!
It's not every day I get to wear\na special outfit like this...\nSo it would be a waste not to show it off to you, really.
Beachside jobs pay surprisingly well, don't they?\nAnd I get to spend time with you, so that's a bonus, too!

Somehow I can always relax
when I'm around you...
Oh, but that isn't an invitation
to stare! It's still embarrassing...
The beach is such a relaxing place, I might even forget how to fight... Haha, just kidding.

I've never spent much time
at the beach in the past...
It's more fun than I realized.
Or is that because I'm with you?
I'm always busy with part-time jobs, but lately, I've been thinking I'd like to try making more time for you as well.
We're teacher and student,\nbut somehow I seem to find myself relying on you...\nHaha, how embarrassing.
H-Happy Halloween.\nAhh... this is embarrassing...
Trick or treat!\nGive me candy, or I'll curse...\nah, I mean... play a trick on you.
At Halloween, the crowd around you is noticeably larger...\nDoesn't it weigh you down at all?

This outfit makes me look like
a Halloween enthusiast,
which is embarrassing...
But I still hope you like it.
The spirits are having such fun... Halloween is special for them.\nAnd I'm... enjoying myself too. Since I'm w-with you...
Our Halloween dance party\nis about to begin.\nWhy don't you come and join in? It's sure to be a wonderful time.
So many spirits have come to our Halloween party! This season heightens spiritual senses, so perhaps you can see them too?
Father... Halloween is a happy occasion, so please don't ruin it by harassing young women.
This is a little embarrassing, but... would you like to dance with me?\nI want to dance the night away along with the spirits.

I've never enjoyed Halloween
so much before... I can hardly
control my excitement.
This is all thanks to you.
Today, Miyako is the wolfy terror that terrorizes! If you don't want to be dinner, hand over pudding!
Pumpkin pudding? Sounds like an insult to the name of pudding!\n*munch* W-whoa, tasty!\nMiyako takes back that last thing!
With all these costume people, ghosts can come and get candy without any suspiciousing!\nSee, there's one behind you!
Trick or pudding!\nIf you don't gimme pudding,\nMiyako will haunt you forever!
Miyako invites you to a special Halloween party! Fee for entry is, ummm... Ten puddings will do!
Ghosties, ghosties, everywhere!\nSo many ghosts make Halloween funner than the funnest of fun!\nParty time is here!
Alive people, dead people, everyone can have fun at Halloween! Miyako thinks Halloween is the bestestest!
Trick or pudding!\nWhere there's pudding,\nthere's Miyako!
Having Halloween times with you makes Miyako super happy!\nWith pudding to eat, and you to haunt, it's the bestest afterlife!
Tonight, Miyako's life is even betterer than when Miyako was living! Halloween with you is Miyako's favoritest time!
Heh! ♪ This costume's perfect. I'm just oozing adult charm! Everyone'll be head over heels for me. ♪
*sigh* I might be too popular for my own good in this costume. Someone save me from my own sinful nature...
Wait, that candy's for me?! Woo! B-but don't assume I'm super happy about it! I'm not a kid, okay?!
You realize how much of an honor it is to spend Halloween with me, right? And it's time to collect candy, so lead the way!
I can hop on my broom and fly through the sky anytime I want. ♪ But don't worry. I'll let you on as well.
Trick or treat! ♪ Tonight's a party, and I'm the main event! So get that candy ready for me!
Ohohoho! ♪ Just look at this elegant, classy outfit! I'm a captivating lady if there ever was one.
Not a single person can take their eyes off me right now. But I don't blame them. This is the most enticing I've ever been!
I'm giving you a special invitation to tonight's party, so it's your duty to lead the way to the venue. ♪
This year's Halloween is so much fun! Going to a party, dressing up and getting candy are great, but most of all... You've been with me the whole time!
